sentences.en: All interior walls, floors and ceiling are constructed with hard, nonporous, non - shedding materials.
sentences.cn: 所有内部墙壁 、 地板和天花板均采用硬质 、 无孔 、 不脱落材料建造.

sentences.en: As for your cutting board, use glass or plastic, both of which are nonporous and most resistant to germs.
sentences.cn: 玻璃或塑料材质的切菜板不会渗漏，预防细菌滋生效果最好。

sentences.en: Fine point dry ease markers for white board and other nonporous surface.
sentences.cn: 圆头笔尖,书写笔型白板笔,可在各种白板和光滑表面书写.

sentences.en: If half of your landscaped areas are paved or covered with nonporous materials, precipitation will drain to other to drain to planted soil areas.
sentences.cn: 如果您的花木种植区一半的道路，或与无孔材料覆盖，降水将流失到其他排的种植面积的土壤。

sentences.en: The nonporous and nonreactive hard-anodized surface resists sticking and doesn't affect the flavor or color of food.
sentences.cn: 无孔和无反应的硬阳极氧化表面抗粘，不影响味道或颜色的食物。

sentences.en: These nonporous surfaces paint badly with a brush.
sentences.cn: 这些无孔的表面很难以刷子上漆。

sentences.en: Walls, floors, windows, doors and ceiling of packaging and other non-production areas are constructed with hard, nonporous, non-shedding materials.
sentences.cn: 包装和其他非生产区的墙壁、地板、门和天花板均采用硬质、无孔、不脱落材料建造。

trans.tran_en: not permeable to water, air, or other fluids
